org.actus.states

Class StateSpace

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.actus.states.StateSpace

  • public final class StateSpace
extends Object
    A data structure representing various states of a ContractType

    The states of a ContractType contain important information used when evaluating PayOffFunction. Further, states themselves contain atomic analytical elements such as the nominal value or accrued interest for a lending instrument. On the other hand, states are updated throughout an instrument's lifetime through evaluation of StateTransitionFunction in the various ContractEvents.
